title: The Raising of the Cross
description: The Raising of the Cross; Jean Pierre Rousselet (French, active about 1677 - 1736); Paris, France; about 1720 - 1730; Tempera and gold leaf on paper bound between pasteboard covered outside in original dark blue morocco, and inside in red morocco in fanfare style; Leaf: 11.9 × 7.1 cm (4 11/16 × 2 13/16 in.); Ms. Ludwig V 8, fol. 19v; J. Paul Getty Museum, Los Angeles, California
